about.heading: Teaching Philosophy
about.paragraph1: I believe chess should be accessible to everyone, regardless of age or experience. My teaching approach focuses on building strong fundamentals while making learning enjoyable and stress-free.
about.paragraph2: With over 5 years of experience teaching beginners, I've developed a structured curriculum that meets each student where they are. Whether you're 5 or 55, rated 0 or 1200, I tailor lessons to your pace and goals.
about.paragraph3: My students appreciate my patient, encouraging style. We celebrate progress, analyze mistakes as learning opportunities, and build confidence one move at a time.

booking.heading: Book Your First Lesson
booking.instructions: Select a convenient time below. Payment instructions will be sent to your email after booking.
booking.note: Having trouble? Contact us directly for assistance.

q1.question: How do I book a lesson?
q1.answer: Simply scroll to the booking section on this page, select a convenient time from the calendar, and complete the form. You'll receive payment instructions via email.

q2.question: Do I need any prior chess experience?
q2.answer: Not at all! I specialize in teaching complete beginners. Whether you're 5 or 55, I'll meet you where you are and build from there.

q3.question: How do I pay for lessons?
q3.answer: After booking, you'll receive a secure payment link via email (powered by Stripe). Simply click the link and complete payment online.

q4.question: What if I need to cancel or reschedule?
q4.answer: You can cancel or reschedule up to 24 hours before your lesson without penalty. Just use the link in your booking confirmation email.

q5.question: What platform do you use for lessons?
q5.answer: Lessons are conducted online via Zoom or Google Meet. You'll receive the meeting link in your confirmation email.

q6.question: Do I need a chessboard or special software?
q6.answer: A physical chessboard is helpful but not required. We'll use online chess tools during lessons. I'll guide you through setup on our first call.

q7.question: Do you teach in French and English?
q7.answer: Yes! I offer fully bilingual instruction. Let me know your preference when booking.

q8.question: What age groups do you teach?
q8.answer: I teach students of all ages, from complete beginners to early intermediate players.
